review: We've had the Fire Stick for almost two weeks and no complaints.  Its great having access to our online streaming services from basically anywhere that has a HDMI port (any tv,  computer,  ect).  Extremely portable and small.  The remote is super simple nothing fancy and the best part for me with a Samsung phone (android system) you can download an Amazon Fire remote app!  Basically we're happy so far.

review: I got this as a gift for my husband and he loves it. We subscribe to Netflix, we have on demand and some premium channels but he has watched nothing but this. He loves how quickly it starts up, as opposed to Netflix and he likes the ease of the remote. It arrived 6 days earlier than anticipated also :)

review: Great if you have Hulu, Nexflix, etc, other wise, pretty useless.Also, I don't like how on the commercial, it showed them just plugging into the TV and it working.  No where did it show it needed to be plugged into a power source.  The way my TV is set up, I had to reconfigure the HDMI ports for everything else to accommodate for the power cord placement.
